sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NOTIFICATIONS( NOTIFICATION_ID, SENDER, RECEIVER, NOTIFICATION_STATUS, NOTIFICATION_TYPE, NOTIFICATION_SEND_DATE, NOTIFICATION_NOTE, NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE_ID ) VALUES ( #notifId#, #senderId#, #receiverId#, 1, 1, SYSDATE, #notifValue#, #notifType# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT page.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_ID AS notificationId, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS senderName, EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS receiverName, NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_STATUS AS notificationStatus, NOTIF_TEMPLATE.NOTIFICATION_NAME AS notificationNameType, NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_SEND_DATE AS notificationSendDate, NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_NOTE AS notificationNote, NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE_ID AS notificationTemplateId FROM NOTIFICATIONS NOTIF JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.SENDER JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP ON EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.RECEIVER JOIN NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATES NOTIF_TEMPLATE ON NOTIF_TEMPLATE.NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE_ID = NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE_ID WHERE RECEIVER=#employeeId#
UPPER(NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_ID) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(E.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
ORDER BY NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_ID ASC) page WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) WHERE rnum >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NOTIFICATIONS NOTIF JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.SENDER JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP ON EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.RECEIVER WHERE RECEIVER=#employeeId#
UPPER(NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_ID) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(E.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(EMP.EMPLOYEE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')

SELECT NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_NOTE AS notificationNote, NT.NOTIFICATION_NAME AS notificationNameType FROM NOTIFICATIONS NOTIF JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.SENDER JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP ON EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.RECEIVER JOIN NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATES NT ON NT.NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE_ID = NOTIF.NOTIFICATION_TEMPLATE_ID WHERE NOTIFICATION_STATUS = '1' AND RECEIVER = #employeeId# AND ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NOTIFICATIONS NOTIF JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.SENDER JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP ON EMP.EMPLOYEE_ID = NOTIF.RECEIVER WHERE NOTIFICATION_STATUS = '1' AND RECEIVER = #employeeId#
